After starting up the first 2 Ringos:

[zbloomquist3@networklab3 ~]$ python ringo.py S 12221 0 0 5
[zbloomquist3@networklab4 ~]$ python ringo.py S 13331 130.207.107.14 12221 5

This is what the 3rd one joining the ring looks like:

[zbloomquist3@networklab3 ~]$ python ringo.py S 14441 130.207.107.15 13331 5
Ringo running on 130.207.107.14:14441

130.207.107.15:13331	<--	HELO
130.207.107.15:13331	-->	RTT 130.207.107.14:12221:124
130.207.107.15:13331	-->	PING
 130.207.107.15:13331	<--	PING
130.207.107.15:13331	<--	PONG 
 130.207.107.14:12221	<--	PING
130.207.107.14:12221	-->	PONG 
130.207.107.14:12221	<--	RTT 130.207.107.14:12221:0
130.207.107.14:12221	-->	PING
130.207.107.14:12221	<--	PONG 
130.207.107.14:12221	-->	RTT 130.207.107.15:13331:124;130.207.107.14:14441:0
130.207.107.15:13331	-->	RTT 130.207.107.14:12221:124;130.207.107.14:14441:126
130.207.107.15:13331	-->	PONG 
130.207.107.14:12221	<--	RTT 130.207.107.14:12221:0;130.207.107.15:13331:116
130.207.107.15:13331	<--	RTT 130.207.107.14:12221:0;130.207.107.15:13331:116
